participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is imaginative and playful, often lost in her thoughts but struggles with social interactions.
participant_1.background: i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i don't have many friends. i love to play pobox. i am a 12 year old girl. i hate school.

participant_2.name: Dr. Sarah Williams
participant_2.personality: Dr. Sarah is compassionate and dedicated, with a nurturing side that comes out when she talks about her daughter.
participant_2.background: i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. my daughter is a child prodigy.
